_source.text: According to a May 2015 progress report to Congress, the Environmental Protection Agency's (EPA) Integrated Risk Information System (IRIS) is better off than it was a year ago, but not as effective as it needs to be to deliver timely, high-quality and credible chemical risk assessments.
